name: The Wrap!
short_description:
The Wrap! is my attempt to make interactive learning object authoring accessible to teachers and educators without the need to be a programmer or a web designer.

The Wrap! uses a simple text file to populate the learning object with media, text and interactions.

The Wrap! is not intended as an assessment tool, but it will provide feedback and self-assessment to those for whom the content is intended.
